traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The slug has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The slug can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The slug makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
